verses.verse: In those <S%H3117>days<s%> was <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H2470>sick<s%> unto <S%H4191>death<s%>. And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Set thine <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H6680>order<s%>; for thou shalt <S%H4191>die<s%>, and not <S%H2421>live<s%>. Set: Heb. Give charge concerning thine house
Then he <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

I <S%H577>beseech<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H2142>remember<s%> now how I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee in <S%H571>truth<s%> and with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and have <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>. And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H1065><s%> <S%H1419>sore<s%>. sore: Heb. with a great weeping

And it came to pass, afore <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> was gone <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5892><s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, court: or, city

Turn <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> the <S%H5057>captain<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> thy <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> thy <S%H1832>tears<s%>: behold, I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> thee: on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt go <S%H5927>up<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And I will <S%H3254>add<s%> unto thy <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; and I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee and this <S%H5892>city<s%> out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>; and I will <S%H1598>defend<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> for mine own sake, and for my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> sake.

And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> a <S%H1690>lump<s%> of <S%H8384>figs<s%>. And they <S%H3947>took<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it on the <S%H7822>boil<s%>, and he <S%H2421>recovered<s%>.

And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%>, What shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7495>heal<s%> me, and that I shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>?

And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, This <S%H226>sign<s%> shalt thou have of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: shall the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> go <S%H1980>forward<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>degrees<s%>, or go <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>degrees<s%>?

And <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, It is a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> for the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> to go <S%H5186>down<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>degrees<s%>: nay, but let the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H322>backward<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>degrees<s%>.

And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and he <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>degrees<s%> <S%H322>backward<s%>, <S%H4609>by<s%> which it had gone <S%H3381>down<s%> in the <S%H4609>dial<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>. dial: Heb. degrees

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H1255>Berodachbaladan<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1081>Baladan<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> and a <S%H4503>present<s%> unto <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>: for he had <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> had been <S%H2470>sick<s%>. Berodachbaladan: or, Merodachbaladan

And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto them, and <S%H7200>shewed<s%> them all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his precious <S%H5238>things<s%>, the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and the <S%H1314>spices<s%>, and the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>ointment<s%>, and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H3627>armour<s%>, and all that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H214>treasures<s%>: there was <S%H1697>nothing<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, nor in all his <S%H4475>dominion<s%>, that <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H7200>shewed<s%> them not. precious things: or, spicery armour: or, jewels: Heb. vessels

Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, What <S%H559>said<s%> these <S%H582>men<s%>? and from <S%H370>whence<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they unto thee? And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, They are <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, even from <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What have they <S%H7200>seen<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house<s%>? And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, All the things that are in mine <S%H1004>house<s%> have they <S%H7200>seen<s%>: there is <S%H1697>nothing<s%> among my <S%H214>treasures<s%> that I have not <S%H7200>shewed<s%> them.
And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Behold, the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, that all that is in thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, and that which thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> have laid up in <S%H686>store<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon<s%>: <S%H1697>nothing<s%> shall be <S%H3498>left<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And of thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> that shall <S%H3318>issue<s%> from thee, which thou shalt <S%H3205>beget<s%>, shall they take <S%H3947>away<s%>; and they shall be <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> in the <S%H1964>palace<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> unto <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%>, <S%H2896>Good<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Is it not good, if <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> be in my <S%H3117>days<s%>? Is it: or, Shall there not be peace and truth, etc

And the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, and all his <S%H1369>might<s%>, and how he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1295>pool<s%>, and a <S%H8585>conduit<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>?
And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>: and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead.
